name: CLOSE NON-TAS FILE
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the OPENV/CLOSE commands.

parameters.name: delete_yn
parameters.description: delete_yn - Optional - If you want to delete the file after closing it then put a Y here.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Close Non-TAS File. It is the close command that would be used for files opened with the OPNO command.
